ygData.subject: Re: Giant snakespine belt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am a 30th Level Ranger and an Ogre Guard (Shadowknight) did a bubble of damage to me (about 160 points)including his Harm Touch. I would imagine by that
ygData.messageBody:
--- MFerrulo@... wrote:
> From: MFerrulo@...
>
> In a message dated 9/12/99 2:02:53 PM Eastern
> Standard Time,
> belgarth_of_surefall@... writes:
>
> <<
> They are found on the Ogres in W. Karana. It is
> on the Ogre Shaman and above if I recall, I wasn't
> paying attention which mob we got it from. I have
> one and like it very much. Not sure on the value
> though.

> Belgarth >>
>
> These ogres have lots of good stuff it seems. What
> Lvl are they?
>
> Wizaro Wratcaster

I am a 30th Level Ranger and an Ogre Guard
(Shadowknight) did a bubble of damage to me (about 160
points)including his Harm Touch. I would imagine by
that they are about level 23 or so, low blue to me.
(these don't have much for loot though). I think the
Shamans were about 30 (wasn't paying much attention,
friend killed these) and Chief Goonda about 34th
level. The Chief hits quite hard. I got jumped by him
and he did over 80 points per swing, two swings a
round.

I was with a level 50 Wizard friend at the time, so
I don't know how hard they are in an average group.

Belgarth
